3: And, that's all of Mr. Hassen's words.
I still can't believe HQ would allow us to stay in Forsaken camps for a night...
They really are trying to use us as diplomatic envoys.
Miss Celica, will the Purifying Force still go after Watanabe?
About that...
Hmm?
Hmph... What a convoluted world we live in.
Heyo, Commandant. You get some nice sleep last night?
Where were you last night?
Just on patrol. They seem to think I'm part of the Gray Raven squad.
Ah whatever, we have a new mission, right?
Celica, tell us the details already!
You'll have to depart from Forsaken territory and go toward City 019 around 30km away from here.
Kamui... Did Chrome not give you a new mission?
Your next mission isn't about tracking the Ascendants, but it's still dangerous—the location there is uninvestigated.
Kamui, as part of the Strike Hawk squad, will also go there to search for any possible Ascendant traces.
Alrighty!
After a while...
Why's... Watanabe following us?
City 019 is a nearby source of corruption and has been endangering the area.
This is a life-or-death matter for the Forsaken, naturally, I have to be a part of this.
Okay—City 019, underground shelter city. This is its entrance.
(Watanabe... He's not being straight with himself.)
(Watanabe's similar to Lee in this front.)
(Hmm, well, maybe slightly different, still though...)
(I... don't think I can really tell...)
